clusters.title: Major data breach as flood victims' personal information uploaded to ChatGPT
clusters.neutral_headline: Data Breach Exposes Flood Victims' Personal Information

items.title: Major data breach as flood victims' personal information uploaded to ChatGPT
items.standfirst: The victims of the breach applied for the Northern Rivers Resilient Homes Program in the aftermath of the 2022 floods in northern NSW.
items.content: The personal data of up to 3000 flood victims in NSW has been exposed after it was uploaded to ChatGPT.In a statement released this morning, the NSW Reconstruction Authority (RA) confirmed personal data, including names and addresses, phone numbers and other personal and health information, was uploaded to the platform by a former contractor of the RA.The victims of the breach applied for the Northern Rivers Resilient Homes Program in the aftermath of the 2022 floods in northern NSW.READ MORE: 'Breathtaking abuse of the law': Trump sends troops inWhilst the RA insist there is no evidence the data has been made public, it admits it will take some time to verify this, as the data was shared in a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet with 12,000 rows of information."The breach occurred when a former contractor of the RA uploaded data containing personal information to an unsecured AI tool which was not authorised by the department," the RA said."The process is highly complex and time consuming and we acknowledge that it has taken time to notify people."READ MORE: Alleged gunman 'fired indiscriminately' in Sydney shooting spreeThe RA believes forensic examination of the issue will be completed in the coming days, offering an insight into the extent of the breach and what specific data could have been exposed.They also say there is currently no evidence that any of the uploaded data has been accessed by a third party."We understand this news is concerning and we are deeply sorry for the distress it may cause for those who have engaged with the program," the RA said."We know people will want to know exactly what has been shared and we are doing all we can to get that information to them as soon as possible."DOWNLOAD THE 9NEWS APP: Stay across all the latest in breaking news, sport, politics and the weather via our news app and get notifications sent straight to your smartphone. Available on the Apple App Store and Google Play.

items.title: Major data breach as up to 3,000 flood victims' details loaded to ChatGPT
items.standfirst: The NSW Reconstruction Authority says the breach occurred in March and involved the personal data of applicants to the Northern Rivers Resilient Homes Program.
items.content: The NSW Reconstruction Authority says the breach occurred in March and involved the personal data of applicants to the Northern Rivers Resilient Homes Program.

ai_summary: A major data breach exposed flood victims' personal information.
The breach involved data uploaded to ChatGPT.
The victims applied for the Northern Rivers program.
The NSW Reconstruction Authority confirmed the breach.
The breach occurred in March.

items.standfirst: There are growing calls for the NT government to ban machetes and crossbows as older residents share horror stories of being targeted in their own homes by armed youths.
items.content: There are growing calls for the NT government to ban machetes and crossbows as older residents share horror stories of being targeted in their own homes by armed youths.

ai_summary: Older Territorians shared home invasion stories.
There are calls to ban machetes and crossbows.
Residents were targeted in their homes.
Armed youths were involved in the incidents.
The NT government is being urged to act.

clusters.title: Man most Palestinians want as leader has spent years in solitary confinement
clusters.neutral_headline: Most Palestinians Want Barghouti as Leader

items.title: Man most Palestinians want as leader has spent years in solitary confinement
items.standfirst: Despite spending more than 20 years behind bars, Marwan Barghouti is the man most Palestinians would want as their leader.
items.content: Despite spending more than 20 years behind bars, Marwan Barghouti is the man most Palestinians would want as their leader.

ai_summary: Marwan Barghouti is the preferred leader for Palestinians.
He has spent over 20 years in prison.
He is a prominent figure in Palestinian politics.
Despite imprisonment, he remains popular.
He is the most desired leader.

clusters.title: Australia's F-35 fighter jet export details 'quietly' disappeared
clusters.neutral_headline: F-35 Fighter Jet Export Details Removed from Website

items.title: Australia's F-35 fighter jet export details 'quietly' disappeared
items.standfirst: Department of Defence emails show that a website dedicated to Australia's role in the global F-35 supply chain used by Israel to maintain its fighter jets was removed at the start of the war in Gaza.
items.content: Department of Defence emails show that a website dedicated to Australia's role in the global F-35 supply chain used by Israel to maintain its fighter jets was removed at the start of the war in Gaza.

ai_summary: Details about Australia's F-35 exports were removed.
The website was dedicated to Australia's role.
The website was used by Israel.
The removal occurred at the start of the war.
The website was about the F-35 supply chain.

clusters.title: Heart attack signs look different in women. It affects the care they receive
clusters.neutral_headline: Heart Attack Signs Differ in Women, Affecting Care

items.title: Heart attack signs look different in women. It affects the care they receive
items.standfirst: Australian women having a heart attack are less likely to be promptly diagnosed and treated compared to men, although the gender gap in cardiac care is narrowing.
items.content: Australian women having a heart attack are less likely to be promptly diagnosed and treated compared to men, although the gender gap in cardiac care is narrowing.

ai_summary: Heart attack signs differ in women.
Women receive less prompt diagnosis and treatment.
The gender gap in cardiac care is narrowing.
Women are less likely to be treated quickly.
This affects the care women receive.

clusters.title: Zelenskyy slams latest Russian 'aerial terror'
clusters.neutral_headline: Ukraine Targeted by Russian Aerial Strikes in Multiple Regions

items.title: Zelenskyy slams latest Russian 'aerial terror'
items.standfirst: Authorities say nine regions across Ukraine were targeted by Russian night-time drone, missile and aerial bomb strikes.
items.content: Authorities say nine regions across Ukraine were targeted by Russian night-time drone, missile and aerial bomb strikes.

ai_summary: Russian forces launched drone, missile, and aerial bomb strikes overnight across Ukraine.
Nine Ukrainian regions were reportedly targeted during the attacks.
Ukrainian authorities have reported the attacks and are assessing damage.
The strikes occurred during nighttime hours, according to reports.
President Zelenskyy condemned the attacks as acts of aerial terror.
